product-a.comment: REMOVE ME! Fancy product-a which lives in separate accounts for dev, qa and prod

deve.comment: The services array lists all service available for product-a in development
deve.bastion-host-name: The `Name` tag of the bastion host
deve.connection-role-name: The name of the role used to connect to the Bastion host. This role is assumed.

services.name: service-a_10000
services.comment: Port 10000 is connected to the fancy MySql database

services.name: service-b_10001
services.comment: Port 10001 is connected to the fancy PostgreSql database
